name: quickly
description: Une biblioth√®que TypeScript avec du Rust pour la performance

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:rust && npm run build:ts && npm run copy:wasm
scripts.test:add: npm run build && npx webpack --entry ./src/tests/array/math.test.ts --output-filename add-test.js --output-path ./dist --mode development --target node --resolve-extensions .ts,.js && cp pkg/*.wasm dist/ && node dist/add-test.js
scripts.bench:add: npm run build && npx webpack --entry ./src/tests/benchmarks/array-add.bench.ts --output-filename add-bench.js --output-path ./dist --mode development --target node --resolve-extensions .ts,.js && cp pkg/*.wasm dist/ && node dist/add-bench.js
